<cms:formatter var="content">
    <!-- Get the current locale -->
    ${cms.locale}

    <!-- Get values from the XML content in the selected locale   -->
    ${content.localeValue['de']['Title']}

    <!--  Get Lists of values from the XML content in the selected locale -->
    ${content.localeValueList['de']['Teaser']}

    <!--  Get Booleans that indicate if a specified-->
    <!--  Locale is available in the XML content. -->
    ${content.hasLocaleValue['de']['Title']}
</cms:formatter>
